${ModID}:Wavycap.NAME: Wavycap
${ModID}:Wavycap.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Deal 5 damage. Gain 5 Block. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy. Gain 3 Block.

${ModID}:Cherryburst.NAME: Cherryburst
${ModID}:Cherryburst.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Rotleaf.NAME: Rotleaf
${ModID}:Rotleaf.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Apply 5 Poison. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Apply 3 Poison to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Buffbloom.NAME: Buffbloom
${ModID}:Buffbloom.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Gain 1 Strength. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Gain 2 Temporary Strength.

${ModID}:Agileaf.NAME: Agileaf
${ModID}:Agileaf.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Gain 2 Temporary Dexterity.

${ModID}:Frightlure.NAME: Frightlure
${ModID}:Frightlure.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Sappervine.NAME: Sappervine
${ModID}:Sappervine.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Apply 2 Weak. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Apply 2 Weak to a random enemy.

${ModID}:Gummush.NAME: Gummush
${ModID}:Gummush.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Retain your hand this turn. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Retain a card in your hand this turn.

${ModID}:Swiftroot.NAME: Swiftroot
${ModID}:Swiftroot.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Draw 2 cards. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Draw a card.

${ModID}:ForgesEmbrace.NAME: Forge's Embrace
${ModID}:ForgesEmbrace.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Upgrade all cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:Artiflower.NAME: Artiflower
${ModID}:Artiflower.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Gain 1 Artifact. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Gain 1 Temporary Artifact.

${ModID}:Chaosbloom.NAME: Chaosbloom
${ModID}:Chaosbloom.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Play the top 2 cards of your draw pile. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Play the top card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:GamblersFruit.NAME: Gambler's Fruit
${ModID}:GamblersFruit.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Discard your hand then draw 3 cards. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Discard a card then draw a card.

${ModID}:Steeleaf.NAME: Steeleaf
${ModID}:Steeleaf.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Gain 3 Metallicize. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Gain 3 Plated Armor.

${ModID}:Nitrogliceroot.NAME: Nitrogliceroot
${ModID}:Nitrogliceroot.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Deal 30 damage to ALL enemies. Take 10 damage. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Deal 15 damage to ALL enemies. Take 5 damage.

${ModID}:Spectralite.NAME: Spectralite
${ModID}:Spectralite.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Gain 1 Intangible. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Take half damage this turn.

${ModID}:MindsEye.NAME: Mind's Eye
${ModID}:MindsEye.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Fetch a card from your draw pile. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Scry 7. Draw a card.

${ModID}:Doubleye.NAME: Doubleye
${ModID}:Doubleye.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Brew: Your next card this turn is played twice. NL ${ModID}:Eat: Choose a card in your hand. Add a copy of it to your hand.
